ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:0.4_0: The sub-chapter on sunshades and sandals
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:0.5_0: 89. The training rule on what is scented
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.2_0: the nuns from the group of six were bathing with scents and oil-seed flour.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.3_0: People then complained and criticized those nuns,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.4_0: “How can nuns bathe with scents and oil-seed flour? They are just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.5_0: Nuns heard the complaints of those people,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.6_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.7_0: “How can the nuns from the group of six bathe with scents and oil-seed flour?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.8_0: “Is it true, monks, that those nuns do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.11_0: “... How can the nuns from the group of six do this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.12_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.13_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.14.1_0: ‘If a nun bathes with scents and oil-seed flour, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:2.1.8_0: ground sesame is what is meant.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:2.1.10_0: if he bathes, then for the effort there is an act of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:2.2.2_0: if she wears it because she is ill;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:2.2.3_0: if she bathes with ordinary oil-seed flour;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:2.2.5_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:2.2.6_0: The sixth rule, the training rule on fire, is finished.
